Judaism.summary: Monotheistic faith of the Israelites centered on the covenant with YHWH, observing Torah and awaiting the Messiah.

Christianity.summary: Faith in Jesus Christ as the Son of God and Savior of humanity, emphasizing salvation by grace and eternal life.

Islam.summary: Monotheistic faith revealed to Muhammad, affirming earlier prophets but denying the divinity of Christ.

Baha'i Faith.summary: Modern monotheistic religion teaching the unity of all faiths and progressive revelation through multiple prophets.
